abilities.name: Solid Shell
abilities.effect: Any damage done to Anorith by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Fury Cutter
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. If 1 of them is heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage. If 2 of them are heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage. If all of them are heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 50 more damage.
